mapper.select: SELECT * FROM M_BUILDING ORDER BY buildingName ASC
SELECT * FROM M_FLOOR WHERE buildingCode = #{id} ORDER BY floorAlias ASC
SELECT floorCode FROM M_FLOOR WHERE buildingCode = #{id} ORDER BY floorAlias ASC
SELECT * FROM M_ROOM WHERE floorCode = #{id} ORDER BY roomAlias ASC
SELECT * FROM M_BUILDING b WHERE b.buildingName LIKE #{buildingName} ORDER BY b.buildingCode desc

SELECT b.buildingName buildingName, f.floorAlias floorAlias, r.roomAlias roomAlias FROM M_BUILDING b JOIN M_FLOOR f ON (f.floorCode = #{floorCode}) JOIN M_ROOM r ON (r.roomCode = #{roomCode}) WHERE b.buildingCode=#{buildingCode}
